nodes.bodyText:
This should return true.
True means "Yes this Item was me".
With false you are telling Slimefun to keep looking for items that match...

I am also thinking whether a Material comparison for ENCHANTMENT_TABLE and DISPENSER may not be a better idea.
It would definitely be better performance-wise.
Also please add a comment to this code to explain why it is there.
I was thinking that too but added the check so that people don’t accidentally open inventories when trying to use the sugar. Tbh it would work either way.
